name: My Love!
greetingText: Why do you look so good every day? :')
wishText: Cheers for more physical abuse to my life HAHAHAAHAHA, I love you very much. Senxa kana kung makulit ako minsan mahal mo naman aq kaya okay nayon. Wag ka magbabago bebe papakasalan pa kita and also i'll do my best to treat you better!
